'''"Spiraling Duet"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "Spiraling Duet" is obtainable by reaching 1,200 [[A Parade of Providence#Gala Excitement|Gala Excitement]] during the [[A Parade of Providence]] Event.
